wordpressPage.title: Splat
wordpressPage.content:
• Everyone stands in a circle facing inwards with one person in the middle
  • The person in the middle puts their hands together and ‘shoots’ a person saying ‘splat’ as they do.
  • The person who is splatted must duck and the people either side turn and splat each other (with hands together in a gun shape). The person who splats first stays in and the other person is out (at this point they sit down so you know they’re out).
  • If the person who is meant to be ducking doesn’t then they’re out.
  • Eventually you’ll end up with 2 people remaining. For the final showdown put them back to back…say that each time you name a vegetable they must take a step forward and when you say a fruit they turn and shoot. The winner is the one who shoots first on the fruit
